340.title: Fotonovelas
notes:
Picture stories told using photographs, and typically word balloons as well. The Spanish-language term "fotonovelas" is used in this index to group such works here, even if they are otherwise described, e.g., as Photoromans, Photo-novels, etc. See also
  • Aprendo Press
  • De Madre a Madre
  • Fotonovel Publications
  • Fotonovelas Rollán
  • Help!
